title: Data Ethics Simulation: Modular Short-Term Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Virtual scenario-based learning assuming office/administrative roles, with LMS-integrated content delivery

learning_goals: Learners can identify over five ethical dilemma scenarios that may occur during research data processing in a simulated environment.
Learners can analyze the ethical implications of data generation, sharing, and storage processes by applying the concept of "data ecology."
Learners can execute a three-step crisis response protocol in a VR environment after a data breach simulation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
